pages.text: 37|1|Savgand ʙa faristagoni saf ʙa saf [ki ʙaroi parastisi Parvardigor istodaand]
37|2|Va savgand ʙa faristagone, ki aʙrhoro meronand
37|3|Va savgand ʙa faristagone, ki Qur'on tilovat mekunand
37|4|[ki] Be tardid, ma'ʙudi sumo jaktost
37|5|[Hamon] Parvardigori osmonhovu zamin va on ci mijoni onhost va Parvardigori [xursed dar ƣuruʙgohho va] tulu'gohho
37|6|Ba rosti, ki Mo osmoni dunjoro ʙo zevari sitoragon orostem
37|7|Va onro az [dastrasii] har sajtoni sarkas hifz kardem
37|8|[On sajotin hargiz] nametavonand [suxanoni faristagoni] olami ʙoloro ʙisunavand va az har su [ʙo sahoʙhoi otasin] tirʙoron mesavand
37|9|[Az vurudi onon ʙa olami faristagon cilavgiri mesavad va hamvora ʙa] aqiʙ ronda mesavand va azoʙi covidon [dar pes] dorand
37|10|Magar kase, ki nogahon cize [az guftugui faristagon]-ro duzdida gus dihad, ki [dar in surat] sahoʙi duraxson uro dunʙol mekunad

37|11|Az onon [kofiron] ʙipurs, ki ojo ofarinisi [pajkarhoi] onon saxttar ast jo on ci ki Mo [az zaminu osmonho va cahoni ʙekaron] ofaridaem; [dar hole ki] Mo onhoro az gili [ʙearzis va] caspida padid ovardem
37|12|Tu [az inkori onon] dar sigifti va onho [niz suxanonatro dar ʙorai qijomat] masxara mekunand
37|13|Va cun pand doda savand, namepazirand
37|14|Va cun nisonahoi [dar mavridi rostguii Pajomʙar] meʙinand, [onro] ʙa tamasxur megirand
37|15|Va megujand: «In [Qur'on cize] nest, magar codue oskor
37|16|Ojo hangome ki murdem va xok va ustuxon sudem, ʙarangexta xohem sud
37|17|Ojo padaroni mo [niz ʙarangexta mesavand]?»
37|18|Bigu: «Ore, sumo, dar hole ki xor hasted [zinda mesaved]»
37|19|Pas, [vuqui qijomat] tanho ʙo jak ʙong [-i sahmnok] ast va nogahon [hama az qaʙrho ʙerun meojand va dar intizori dasturi Parvardigor, vahsati qijomatro] nazorat mekunand
37|20|Va megujand: «Voj ʙar mo! In [hamon] ruzi cazost»
37|21|[Gufta mesavad: Ore] in hamon ruzi dovariest, ki duruƣas meangosted»
37|22|[Ba faristagon gufta mesavad] «Kasonero, ki [ʙo sirk ʙa xes] sitam kardand,jo ʙo [hamfikron va] hammonandhojason
37|23|va on ci ʙa coi Alloh taolo meparastidand, gird ovared va ʙa rohi duzax hidojatason kuned
37|24|Va ononro nigah dored, ki, hatman, [pes az raftan ʙa duzax] ʙozxost xohand sud
